title: [K-12] Simulation-Based Engineering Design and Analysis Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Electromagnetism and Circuit Theory
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based simulation tools in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of various antenna design parameters on radio wave characteristics using simulation tools.
Learners can predict voltage/current characteristics and interpret experimental results using simulation tools such as Multisim Live in electronic circuit design.
Learners can explain a step-by-step approach to solving engineering design problems based on simulation results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
